item.unidentifiedenchantments.scrollofid: Pace on top of the item you want to identify
enchantment.unidentifiedenchantments.hun: Causes hunger to be depleted faster
enchantment.unidentifiedenchantments.ins: Causes you to always think a mob is close, making you unable to sleep
enchantment.unidentifiedenchantments.van: Does nothing, but it looked pretty
enchantment.unidentifiedenchantments.mad: Causes a creeper to appear every so often, only you can see it, and it does not cause damage.
enchantment.unidentifiedenchantments.for: You gain less experience from killing mobs
enchantment.unidentifiedenchantments.sme: Mobs can find you even if they can't see you
enchantment.unidentifiedenchantments.lum: Your axe only works on wood
